FuncDef:
The reverse interface command configures alarm inversion on an interface.
The undo reverse interface command disables alarm inversion on an interface.
By default, alarm inversion is not enabled on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disable a physical interface from reporting alarms, run the reverse mode auto-resume command to change the global alarm inversion mode to automatic recovery and then run the reverse interface command to configure alarm inversion on the interface.
Prerequisites
The alarm inversion mode has been set to automatic recovery using the reverse mode auto-resume command.
